properties.areaDesc: Walker, TX; Polk, TX; San Jacinto, TX; Trinity, TX
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 8:57AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston has issued a flood warning
for the following rivers...

Trinity River at Riverside affecting the following counties in Texas...Polk...
San Jacinto...Trinity...Walker


For Trinity River at Riverside, Minor flooding is forecasted.

The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Trinity River at Riverside.
* from Saturday morning until further notice or until the warning is canceled.
* At 0847 AM Thursday the stage was 133.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 133.5 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday morning and continue to rise to
near 133.7 feet by early Monday morning. Additional rises are possible
thereafter.
* At 133.5 feet...Minor lowland flooding begins in the vicinity of the gage with
water in the Green Rich Shores subdivision. Backwater flooding up Wright's
Creek impacts Plantation Drive in the Deep River Plantation subdivision.
properties.instruction:
Persons are urged to stay away from the river until water levels recede.

Motorists should avoid any water covered roads and find an alternate route.

Livestock and equipment should remain out of the flood plain for the next few
days.



Stay tuned to NOAA Weather radio or other news sources for further updates.
